description: Breast Imaging relevant hormone history data.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: HORMONE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mammography hormones category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hormone replacement therapy


Tamoxifen


Raloxifene


Other


Estrogen replacement therapy


Combination hormone replacement therapy

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient began taking the related hormone.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient stopped taking the related hormone.

columns.name: COMMENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note ID for free-text information about the hormone history for this patient.

columns.name: CURRENTLY_TAKING_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is currently taking hormones. 'Y' indicates that the patient is currently taking hormones. 'N' or NULL indicates that the patient is not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
